name: Ghost Fever
description:
(Made in less than a week for PB game jam) What if a game could interact with your surronding?
Play and figure it out. Help the voiceless skelly to scare those unfortunate people who decided to explore the woods at night.
Your scream will be his, sneak behind your victim and scream as loud as you can. Every sound you'll make while approaching someone will be heard, make sure not to be seen.
You feed on other's trauma, so try to last as long as you can
(you ACTUALLY have to SCREAM or be silent to interact with this game)

I made this game alone: models, scripting,game concepts... except sound effects and terrain textures, (grass tufts were made by me)
